# Sensor summary

## Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR)
- Using radar over optical remote sensing

- **Advantanges**

> (+) Ability to capture data day or night
> (+) See through clouds
> (+) Weather independence by selecting proper frequency range
> (+) Penetration through the vegetation
canopy and the soil
